description:
Season:
Original Air Date: 5/22/2006

Brooke feels overwhelmed by Stephanie’s offer of the CEO position. Stephen and Nick arrive at Stephanie’s office and tell Brooke not to sign anything. Later, Nick asks Brooke to turn down the job offer and step away from the Forrester family.  Brooke tells Nick that she’s not sure she can do this. Felicia tells Dante they owe it to Dino to see if they can make it as a couple.
